resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158412</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158412</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2716</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Passage of a comet though the solar system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durchgang eines Kometen zwar das Solarsystem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Passage d'une comète cependant le système 
solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Passagem de um cometa though o sistema solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Passaggio di una cometa comunque il sistema 
solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετάβαση ενός κομήτη αν και το ηλιακό σύστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Paso de un cometa sin embargo la Sistema Solar</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the passage of a comet as it travels through the solar system. The animation shows the comet Halley's orbit as compared to the entire solar system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">comets</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die den Durchgang eines Kometen 
zeigt, während sie durch das Solarsystem reist. Die Animation 
zeigt die Bahn des Komet Halleys verglichen mit dem gesamten 
Solarsystem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre le passage d'une 
comète pendant qu'elle voyage par le système solaire. 
L'animation montre l'orbite du Halley de comète par rapport au 
système solaire entier.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a passagem de um 
cometa enquanto viaja através do sistema solar. O animation 
mostra a órbita do Halley do cometa em comparação ao sistema solar 
inteiro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra il passaggio di una 
cometa mentre attraversa through il sistema solare. La 
animazione mostra l'orbita del Halley della cometa rispetto all'intero
sistema solare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τη μετάβαση ενός 
κομήτη καθώς ταξιδεύει μέσω του ηλιακού συστήματος. Η 
ζωτικότητα εμφανίζει τροχιά του Halley κομητών σε σύγκριση με 
το ολόκληρο ηλιακό σύστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra el paso de un cometa
mientras que viaja a través de la Sistema Solar. La animación 
muestra la órbita del Halley del cometa con respecto a la Sistema 
Solar entera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarsystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kometen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système solaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comètes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cometas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema solare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comete</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστρονομία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιακό σύστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κομήτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">astronomía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema Solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cometas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
